layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x40
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x40
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x24
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x24 [color=#000080]
        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x24 [border: (3px solid #000080) none]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,3) size 268x18
            text run at (0,3) width 268: "This box should be open ended at the left."
